sn38.10:1.6: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada, etasam tanhanam pahanaya”ti?
sn38.10:1.7: “Atthi kho, avuso, maggo atthi patipada, etasam tanhanam pahanaya”ti.
sn38.10:1.8: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada, etasam tanhanam pahanaya”ti?
sn38.10:1.9: “Ayameva kho, avuso, ariyo atthangiko maggo, etasam tanhanam pahanaya, seyyathidam—
sn38.10:1.11: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada, etasam tanhanam pahanaya”ti.
sn38.10:1.12: “Bhaddako, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada, etasam tanhanam pahanaya.
